job.command: # source ~/.tcshrc # setenv STARFPE NO cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} echo $INPUTFILE0 echo $INPUTFILE0 | grep ':' set f = 1 if (! $?) then set chain = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $1}'` set dir = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $2}'` set file = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $3}'` set l = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $4}'` set ref = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $5}'` #echo "$INPUTFILE0 = $$INPUTFILE0 ==> chain = $chain, dir = $dir, file = $file, l = $l, ref = $ref" else else exit 1; endif if (! -d $dir) mkdir -p $dir cd $dir; source ~/bin/SetVersion.csh set log = $file:t:r; set logFile = ${log}.log set refFile = ${log}.log.ref if (-r $refFile) then rm $refFile; endif ln -s $ref $refFile; if (-r $logFile) exit 0; setenv StarEndMakerShell set exec = "root.exe " echo $file | grep 'fz.' if (! $?) set exec = "root4star" which $exec if ($?) exit; ${exec} -q -b -x 'bfc.C('$f','$l',"'$chain',Sti","'$file')' >& ${logFile}
